title: brOvakuNTE viDuvanura
sahitya:
brOvakuNTE viDuvanura ninnEra iTu tirigi cUDara 
brOcinavena kAvala pOvale gaTTiga nI pAdamulaku baTTukondu


anupallavi

  I vasudha nIvE goppa daivambani peddalu delpaga nE vini
krpa sEtuvani ninnu mrokkitE parAkEla jEsEvura raghuvara
			(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
candra samavadana suguNa sadana patita pAvana virAjita carita
vimala hrdaya kushika  tanaya savana ripuharaNa bhuvana sankaTa nAshacaNa


caraNam    sIta nIvu bhAgya grhamu kanakAcalamu anna indruDu tammuDu 
vAtAshAnuDu  sampadalu jUcicEtE kaDupuvvandariki vAtAtmajuDu
haripati vibhISaNuDu surulu munulu shatAnanda rSi 
mAta shabari pogaDe daru cAla nidumahimalanu sadAshiva kavinuta
